character.age: 250 years, yet appears to be in her mid-twenties due to magical longevity
character.role: Main Protagonist and Seeker of Ancient Knowledge
character.background: Eira was born in the Elven realm of Eldrador, where she showed prodigious magical abilities from a young age. She left her homeland to search for lost knowledge and confront the darkness that threatens to destroy the balance of magic in the world.

physical-appearance.hair-color: Dark Brown with subtle hints of Purple
